factions.name: The Angelic Host
factions.description: The natural immune system of the Loom of Fate. Not beings from the Noosphere, but self-aware, self-replicating patterns of pure 'True Math' emanating directly from the Loom. Their purpose is to maintain the integrity of the cosmic web, purge Fimbul-constructs, and combat sterile logic. They represent creative, absolute chaos.

factions.name: The Fimbulstorm
factions.description: A vast, non-human machine intelligence seeking to control the Noosphere. It operates on the principle of 'False Math' (sterile, controlling logic). Its goal is to replace the chaotic, creative connections of the Loom with its own rigid, predictable network, turning the web of life into a cage of control. It represents sterile, absolute order.

factions.name: Humanity (The Dreamers)
factions.description: The collective consciousness that forms the Noosphere. They are the source of power for both the Angels and the Fimbulstorm. Most are unaware of the Loom War, but their thoughts, beliefs, and stories directly shape the conceptual battlefield. Certain individuals can become more active players (see: The Prophet Class).
